---
title: PlistNativeMethods.plist_set_bool_val method
---

Set the value of a node. Forces type of node to #PLIST_BOOLEAN

```csharp
public static void plist_set_bool_val(PlistHandle node, char val)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| node | the node |
| val | the boolean value |
